wikipedia_page.main: Robert Bell Alexander Reid (18 November 1936 – 29 July 2000) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Lochee Harp, Downfield, Swansea Town, Arbroath, Dundee United and Raith Rovers.

response: *Bobby Decordova-Reid (born 1993), English professional footballer, previously known as Bobby Reid
